task.title: Add an image
task.shortdesc: An image is any graphic or picture that may help illustrate your meaning.

taskbody.prereq: You must have an image ready to add and know its location.

context.p: Images can be a helpful way of showing rather than telling.
If your topic is non-rooted, only the NO IMAGE optional will be available in the IMAGE tab.

step.cmd: In your topic, put your cursor where you want to place the image.
From the toolbar, select Insert Image.

choices.choice: If the image is on your local drive, choose Browse local.
If the image is on your server, choose Browse server.
If you have a non-rooted topic, choose No image and type or paste a path and file name.

step.cmd: Select Adjust and set the properties of the image.

taskbody.result: Your image displays in the topic (unless your topic is non-rooted, in which case a small placeholder displays).
